title: Sugar free chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '12 tablespoons granulated artificial or natural sweetener', '2 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg, beaten', '140g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '85g plain chocolate chips', '60g chopped pecans']
